meanings.definition: A class of chemical compounds containing boron and hydrogen.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study boranes to understand their unique properties.
meanings.sent2: Boranes are used in various industrial applications.
meanings.sent3: The boranes at the chemistry lab decided to throw a boron-themed party.
meanings.sent4: The boranes in the reaction mixture danced together like a harmonious chemical ballet.
meanings.sent5: The smell of boranes filled the room, sharp and distinct.

meanings.sent1: Chemists compare the structures of boranes and alkanes.
meanings.sent2: Boranes exhibit similar reactivity to alkanes in certain reactions.
meanings.sent3: The boranes and alkanes had a friendly competition at the science fair.
meanings.sent4: In the world of molecules, boranes are the adventurous cousins of alkanes.
meanings.sent5: The textbook illustration showed the difference between boranes and alkanes clearly.
